devdoc.details: A contract that provides utility functions for interacting with Chromatic markets.

claimableLiquidity(address,int16,uint256.details: Retrieves the claimable liquidity information for a specific trading fee rate and oracle version from the given Chromatic Market.

params._oracleVersion: The oracle version for which to retrieve the claimable liquidity.
params.market: The Chromatic Market from which to retrieve the claimable liquidity information.
params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate for which to retrieve the claimable liquidity.

returns._0: claimableLiquidity An instance of ClaimableLiquidity representing the claimable liquidity information.

claimableLiquidityBatch(address,int16[],.details: Retrieves the claimable liquidity information for a list of trading fee rates and a specific oracle version from the given Chromatic Market.

params._oracleVersion: The oracle version for which to retrieve the claimable liquidity.
params.market: The Chromatic Market from which to retrieve the claimable liquidity information.
params.tradingFeeRates: The list of trading fee rates for which to retrieve the claimable liquidity.

returns._0: claimableLiquidityList An array of ClaimableLiquidity representing the claimable liquidity information for each trading fee rate and the oracle version.

clbBalanceOf(address,address).details: Retrieves the CLB token balances for the specified owner in the given Chromatic market.

params.market: The address of the Chromatic market contract.
params.owner: The address of the CLB token owner.

returns._0: An array of CLBBalance containing the CLB token balance information for the owner.

liquidityBinStatuses(address).details: Retrieves the liquidity bin statuses for the specified Chromatic Market.

params.market: The Chromatic Market contract for which liquidity bin statuses are retrieved.

returns._0: statuses An array of LiquidityBinStatus representing the liquidity bin statuses.

lpReceipts(address,address).details: Retrieves the LP receipts for the specified owner in the given Chromatic market.

params.market: The address of the Chromatic market contract.
params.owner: The address of the LP token owner.

returns.result: An array of LpReceipt containing the LP receipts for the owner.

oracleVersion(address,uint256).details: Retrieves the OracleVersion for the specified oracle version in the given Chromatic market.

params.market: The address of the Chromatic market contract.

returns._0: oracleVersion The OracleVersion for the specified oracle version.

pendingLiquidity(address,int16).details: Retrieves the pending liquidity information for a specific trading fee rate in the given Chromatic market.

params.market: The Chromatic market from which to retrieve the pending liquidity information.
params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate for which to retrieve the pending liquidity.

returns._0: pendingLiquidity An instance of PendingLiquidity representing the pending liquidity information.

pendingLiquidityBatch(address,int16[]).details: Retrieves the pending liquidity information for a list of trading fee rates in the given Chromatic market.

params.market: The Chromatic market from which to retrieve the pending liquidity information.
params.tradingFeeRates: The list of trading fee rates for which to retrieve the pending liquidity.

returns._0: pendingLiquidityList An array of PendingLiquidity representing the pending liquidity information for each trading fee rate.

devdoc.title: ChromaticLens
